_header: Behold man what is my woe / There I hang upon the tree
Subjects: Christ, appeal of, to man; crucifixion
_description: Appeal of Christ to Man from the Cross — two quatrains

NLS18721.First Lines:
Behold man wat is my woþer i hange vp on þe
                    tre…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…ȝif þu wilt fro þi senne goMi merci is redi
                    quan þu wilt
NLS18721.Note:
Followed by note, ‘Ihesu est amor meus’ (f.
                        124vb)
